definition: to collect all the bits to make a whole
to gather together, pool or collect/to happen by chance/to move close to/to exploit an opportunity
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: A lot of things must come together for this to work.
sentences.chinese: 得凑齐了一堆事情，这一代码才能正常工作。

sentences.english: One more volume will complete this series.
sentences.chinese: 再有一本即可凑齐这套丛书。

sentences.english: I ended up having to visit three toy stores to round-up 1, 000 marbles.
sentences.chinese: 结果，我去了三家店才凑齐了1000个弹珠。

sentences.english: Slowly, the money began to pile up.
